name: AIMLE - dialogue management system
short_description:
A dialogue management system including high-level scripting functions, a dialogue grammar based on AIML (but with a rewritten algorithm for 30-60% better performance than AIML and 20-50% better performance than VoiceXML ABNF).
Originally used on robots.
